<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Bard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5064) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 216 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=211)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Bard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5058); Master in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You gain the expert [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).

<title level="2">Expert Bard Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Bard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5065)
name: Expert Bard Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Bard Spellcasting; Master in Occultism
